meaningMnemonic: A <radical>drop</radical> hits your <radical>mustache</radical>. Where did it come from? "Ah, it came from <kanji>yonder</kanji>," you say, <kanji>facing</kanji> that way.
readingMnemonic: Who shot this drop at you from <kanji>yonder</kanji>? You look over yonder, and see a figure. It is <reading>こう</reading>いち.
